Religious visits
Ultimate Kashmir Package from Indore
By Kashmir Online
Sep 10, 2024
4 min read

Experience the tranquility and adventure of Kashmir with our Kashmir tour package from Indore. Discover the wonders of this magical destination.

Looking to escape from Indore to the serene beauty of Kashmir? Our detailed tour package offers a seamless blend of majestic landscapes, rich culture, and thrilling adventures. Whether you prefer flying, taking a train, or driving, we’ve got all the options covered for a smooth journey.

Why Choose Kashmir for Your Next Vacation?

Kashmir, often called “Heaven on Earth,” boasts stunning landscapes of snow-capped mountains, lush valleys, and shimmering lakes. It’s not just a visual delight but also a haven for peace and adventure. The region’s vibrant culture and warm hospitality make it a perfect getaway for relaxation and excitement.

For those planning a Kashmir Vacation from Indore, this region promises an unforgettable experience when you are looking for a family, adventure, honeymoon or a romantic package from Indore.

Highlights of Our Kashmir Tour Packages from Indore: Flexible Transportation Options

Traveling from Indore to Kashmir is an exciting journey as you move from the heart of India to the northern paradise. Here’s a guide on how to make the most of your trip:

Modes of Travel

  1. By Air: The fastest way is to fly from Indore (Devi Ahilya Bai Holkar Airport) to Srinagar (Sheikh ul-Alam Airport) in Kashmir. There are no direct flights, so you’ll have a layover in cities like Delhi or Mumbai.
    • Total time: Around 5-7 hours (including layover).
  •  Booking Links
    • IndiGo
    • SpiceJet
    • GoAir
    • Air India
  1. By Train: There is no direct train from Indore to Kashmir. You can take a train from Indore to Jammu Tawi, the nearest major railway station to Kashmir. From Jammu, you can take a bus or taxi to Srinagar.
  • Indore to Jammu Tawi: Approx. 22-24 hours by train.
  • Jammu to Srinagar: 7-8 hours by road (bus or taxi).

 Booking Links 

  • Indian Railways

By Road: You can also drive or take a bus from Indore to Kashmir. Though it’s a long journey, the road from Jammu to Srinagar is scenic.

  • Indore to Jammu: Approx. 1,300 km, which takes about 24-30 hours by road.
  • Jammu to Srinagar: Approx. 300 km, taking 7-8 hours.

 Booking Links for Taxis and Buses 

  • Redbus

Our Detailed Itinerary

Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar

  • Welcome at Srinagar Airport
  • Transfer to a luxurious houseboat on Dal Lake
  • Evening Shikara ride on the lake
  • Overnight stay in the houseboat

Day 2: Srinagar City Tour

  • Visit the famous Mughal Gardens: Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, and Chashme Shahi
  • Tour the old city and explore local crafts markets
  • Overnight in Srinagar hotel

Day 3: Excursion to Gulmarg

  • Scenic drive to Gulmarg known for its beautiful landscapes and ski resorts
  • Gondola ride to Apharwat Peak
  • Optional skiing or snowboarding
  • Return to Srinagar for the night

Day 4: Pahalgam Sightseeing

  • Drive to Pahalgam, a picturesque town on the Lidder River
  • Visit local sites like Betaab Valley and Aru Valley
  • Enjoy local activities like horse riding or trekking
  • Stay overnight in Pahalgam

Day 5: Visit to Sonamarg

  • Day trip to Sonamarg, the “Meadow of Gold”
  • Activities like pony rides to Thajiwas Glacier
  • Return to Srinagar for overnight stay

Day 6: Departure

  • Transfer to the airport for your return flight to Indore

FAQs

What is the best time to visit Kashmir for adventure activities?

The ideal time to visit Kashmir for adventure activities is from March to October for summer activities and December to February for winter sports.

Are there any safety precautions for adventure activities in Kashmir?

Yes, it is essential to follow safety guidelines provided by instructors and guides, wear appropriate gear, and be aware of weather conditions.

Can beginners try adventure activities in Kashmir?

Absolutely! Kashmir offers a range of activities suitable for beginners, including skiing, trekking, and rafting with professional guidance.

What should I pack for an adventure trip to Kashmir?

Pack appropriate clothing for the season, sturdy shoes, safety gear for specific activities, and essential items like sunscreen, a first-aid kit, and a water bottle.

Are there any restrictions for adventure activities in Kashmir?

Certain activities may have age or health restrictions. It’s best to check with the activity providers for specific requirements.

How can I book a Kashmir tour package from Pune?

You can book your dream vacation to Kashmir by visiting our website, choosing your preferred package, and following the simple booking process. Our team is ready to assist you.
